name: Cornucopia
description:
Cornucopia - an immersive 2.5D farming sim with 50+ NPCs, innovative compost system, unique card system, 200+ recipes. Befriend, date, marry, and have children with 31 NPCs. Attend festivals, auction animals, fish, craft, and play mini-games. In-depth gardening, pet-assisted interactions, and more!

🎉🕹️ Delight in Cornucopia's Unique Features 🕹️🎉




💖 Love & Family: Embark on a journey of love, foster a warm family, and cultivate a flourishing home.
🌳 Master of Agriculture: Nurture a variety of crops and trees, making your farm the envy of all.
👥 Unforgettable NPCs: Build lasting relationships through thoughtful gifting and engaging encounters.
🐄 Pet Power: Harness your pet's power in gathering and combat to face thrilling challenges.
🌽 Bountiful Harvest: Cultivate and trade an array of crops to grow your wealth.
⚒️ Skill Mastery: Hone your skills across various trades, from mining to foraging.
🍳 Culinary Artistry: Whip up delightful recipes to please friends and family.
🎣 Fishing & Festivities: Hook various fish species, delve into immersive mini-games, and revel in festive occasions.
🃏 Strategist's Deck: Collect and strategize with a diverse deck of 326 unique cards.
🏡 Dream Sanctuaries: Personalize your refuge with a variety of properties, from coastal villas to tranquil mountain getaways.
🐎 Thrilling Animal Racing & Breeding: Unlock unique genetics and colors for the ultimate breed and race.
⚔️ Heart-pounding Combat: Battle 12 distinctive enemy types and overcome 5 monumental bosses.
🎁 Shopping Spree: Procure the finest items, furniture, and a diverse array of 24 powerful bombs for your adventurous journey.
🖼️ Creative Freedom: Craft and unlock new furniture and decorations for your idyllic home.
🌐 Rich Exploration: Explore a world teeming with hidden treasures and awe-inspiring secrets.
🍁 Seasonal Experiences: Witness the beauty of changing seasons and distinct annual events.
👫 Building Relationships: Foster relationships with NPCs, earning their trust and revealing unique story arcs.
🏆 Achievement Hunter: Accomplish 97+ achievements for bragging rights and rewards.
🔧 Home Upgrades: Amplify your home with numerous options to create your dream living space.
📚 Rich Lore & History: Immerse yourself in Cornucopia's intricate backstory, unraveling the tales of the land and its residents.

💕 Join the Vibrant Cornucopia Community! 💕


Connect With Us on Discord



Become an invaluable part of our thriving community, a lively hub where experiences are exchanged, creativity ignites, and tales are woven. Wishlist Cornucopia and stay tuned to all our exciting updates and events. Together, let's sow the seeds of a memorable farm-life saga in the enchanting world of Cornucopia!
